property.name: Text
property.value: Act: Target a Ship in this Sea with a tacked Brotherhood Captain on Board. Inflict 4 Hits on that Ship. Act: Tack one of your Crew to draw 1 card from your Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. Show your hand to your opponents. If you do not have any Crew in your hand, you may go through your deck and discard pile and get one Crew aligned to your Captain’s faction. Reveal the Crew to your opponents, and place it in your hand. Shuffle your Deck.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Crimson Rogers

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Swordsman +1 • React: Once per turn, untack Andrei after you suffer and absorbed all of the Hits from a Cannon Attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Holy Crew Attachment -- React: Tack this Crew when you are paying a cancel cost to reduce the cost by this Crew’s Influence cost (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Tack your Captain or one of your Crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. Until the end of the turn, all of your Crew aligned to your Captain’s faction inflict 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.

property.name: Text
property.value: The other Ship in the Boarding may pay the cancel cost of this card. React: Play when you are entering a Boarding. Untack one of your Ship or Crew Attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when a player produces skill points (other than absorbing Hits) without tacking a crew. That player suffers 3 Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Tack Bardo instead of performing a Boarding Attack to tack a non-Captain Crew on the other Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: Swordsman +2 • Bethesda does not tack after conducting a Boarding Attack where a Crew with an Influence cost less than 3 was sunk.

property.name: Text
property.value: Act: Target a Ship in this Sea with a tacked Black Freighter captain on board. Inflict 4 Hits on that Ship. Act: Tack one of your Crew to draw 1 card from your Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tack your Captain or one of your crew with the First Mate trait to play this card. Until the end of the turn, whenever you are suffering hits, you suffer 2 fewer Hits (minimum 0).

property.name: Faction
property.value: Crimson Rogers

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Loyal • Villainous • "Butcher" does not count toward your Crew Maximum. React: Tack "Butcher" when another Ship in this Sea is suffering Hits. That Ship suffers 2 additional Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Act: Target one of your non-Captain Crew in play. Place that Crew in your hand. Discard any cards attached to that Crew. Act: Target a tacked Crew with the No Attachments trait in this Sea. Pay 3 Influence to return the target crew to their owner’s hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Loyal • Villainous • Swordsman +2 • Act: Once per turn, sink one of your Holy Crew to untack your Captain.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Black Freighter

property.name: Text
property.value: Loyal • No Attachments • Skeletal • React: Discard Fornier when you are paying your Ship’s Move Cost to attempt a Boarding. The cost to cancel that Boarding is increased by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to one of your Crew to suffer 3 fewer Hits. This card has the Hand Attachment. A Crew may not have more than 1 Hand Attachment. Whenever this Crew tacks to absorb Hits, this Crew absorbs 2 extra Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Act: Target a Ship in this Sea with a tacked Corsair’s captain on board. Inflict 4 hits on that ship. Act: Tack one of your Crew to draw 1 card from your Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Captains have the following ability: Act: Once per turn, target a Ship to inflict Hits equal to the number of Crew on Board with a different Faction symbol than their Captain.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a Crew in this Sea. That Crew gains the Villainous trait until the end of the turn. The target’s player may sink one of their Crew to cancel this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Castillian Captain Attachment • Unique • -- You must tack one of your Swordsman Crew to put this card into play. React: Tack this card instead of perfomring a Boarding Attack to inflict 3 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.

property.name: Text
property.value: No Attachments • When hiring Deck Hands, you may discard a card from your hand to reduce Deck Hands’ Influence cost to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: No Attachments • Eisen Mercs inflict 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks for each other Crew you have on Board with the title "Eisen Mercs".

property.name: Faction
property.value: Crimson Rogers

property.name: Text
property.value: Villainous • Fate 1 • If Elena is discarded or sunk, you must discard another of your non-Captain Crew.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique • Swordsman +1 • Your Crew with the title "Eisen Mercs" absorb 2 extra Hits when tacking to absorb Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Act: Target a Ship in this Sea with a tacked Explorer’s captain on board. Inflict 4 hits on that ship. Act: Tack one of your Crew to draw 1 card from your Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Crew Attachment • Glamour 1 Knack • Eye -- React: Tack this Crew when a Crew in this sea tacks to produce Cannon. That Crew produces no Cannon

property.name: Text
property.value: Weather - Target a Sea. During the Draw Cards Phase this turn, any player in target Sea may draw 2 extra cards from their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Captain Attachment • Unique • Item -- The skill costs to discard or sink your Ally cards are increased by 1. React: Discard Fair Warning when a player takes an action that results in one of your Ally cards being discarded. That action is cancelled.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Tack your Captain when you are entering a Boarding as the Defender to untack all of your non-Captain crew. The attacker may also untack all of their non-Captain crew.

property.name: Text
property.value: Experienced • Unique • Loyal • Swordsman +3 • Act: Discard Felipe to target a Ship two or more Seas away. Move that Ship 1 Sea towards your Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prize • 2 Seas Away • Unique -- To complete: Pay 3 Adventuring, then suffer 2 Hits. Item • Captain Attachment: Act: Sink this card. All Ships suffer a number of Hits equal to twice the number of Sea Attachments they control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any player may sink this Chantey by sinking three cards from their hand as an action. Crew with the Topman trait have +3 Sailing.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target one of your Loyal Crew with the No Attachments trait. Target Crew gains +2 swashbuckling and +1 to each of their other skills until the end of the turn. Discard that Crew at the end of the Untack Phase this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Weather - Target a Sea. Until the end of the turn, Ships suffering Hits in that Sea, suffer 2 extra Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Loyal • Glamour 1

property.name: Text
property.value: This Sea Attachment • Ally -- Any player in this Sea may sink this card by producing 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. Act: Tack this card to attach it to a Sea adjacent to this Sea. Act: Tack this card to inflict 3 hits on a Ship in this Sea. The target may pay its Ship move Cost and move to an adjacent Sea to cancel this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique • No Attachments • Act: Once per turn, target an Item Attachment on one of your Crew. Attach the Item to another of your Crew.

property.value: Act: Target a Ship in this Sea with a tacked Gosse Captain on Board. Inflict 4 hits on that ship. Act: Tack one of your Crew to draw 1 card from your Deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Crew Attachment • Item -- React: Discard this Attachment instead of performing a Boarding Attack. The opposing player in the Boarding suffers 4 Hits, then you suffer 1 Hit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gunner • Loyal • Pyeryem 1 • When Grigori tacks to absorb Hits, he absorbs 2 extra Hits. React: Tack Grigori when you are entering a Boarding as the Attacker to inflict 2 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away -- To Complete: Pay 5 Adventuring (4 if completed in the Forbidden Sea). Crew Attachment: +1 Swashbuckling. This Crew absorbs 2 extra Hits when tacking to absorb Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: When hiring Henry you may pay 4 Adventuring to reduce Henry’s Influence cost to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Captains have +1 to each of their skills.

property.name: Text
property.value: All Captains have +3 Influence while in their Starting Sea.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a Ship with more than 2 Ship attachments. Target Ship’s controller must discard one of their ship attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique -- React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 5 Hits. While this card is attached you may not untack your Captain during the untack phase and your Captain has -2 to all Skills (minimum 1). You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique -- React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 5 Hits. While this card is attached you must discard a card from your hand to play an Action card. You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique -- React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 5 Hits. While this card is attached you may not use your "Free Move" and you are considered to have 10 less Sailing for Initiative. You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique -- React: Play this card when you are suffering Hits. Attach this card to your ship as a Damage Attachment to absorb 6 Hits. While this card is attached your hand size is reduced by 3 (minimum 0). You may sink this Attachment by paying 4 Swashbuckling as an Action. You may not sink or discard this card with other card effects.

If you have 3 or more unaligned Crew with an Influence cost greater than 2, sink the Attachment to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play this card instead of performing a Boarding Attack to attach this card to the opposing, target Ship as a Damage Attachment. This card may not be sunk or discarded with other card effects.
